title: Rav Ezra Dovid Halevi Neuberger
body: Rav Ezra Dovid Halevi Neuberger zt”l, Rosh Kollel at Yeshivas Ner Yisroel of Baltimore, passed away at 68. He served the yeshiva with devotion for decades.

title: Rabbi Bar Kuperstein's Call
body: Hamas captivity survivor Rabbi Bar Kuperstein urges Israelis to unite in a mass Tefillin gathering this Friday, a dream he had while imprisoned in Gaza.
